tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's crucial to have the right doctor by your side during the journey of pregnancy. I am incredibly grateful for my experience with Dr. Daksha. Throughout my pregnancy, she has shown unwavering kindness and professionalism, guiding me with the utmost care every step of the way.

Dr. Daksha's emphasis on natural delivery and her tailored approach to diet and exercise were particularly impressive. She addressed each issue methodically, always prioritizing the safety of both mother and baby. During labor, her constant support and encouragement for a natural delivery were invaluable.

Her friendly demeanor, exceptional patience, and genuine care made her a pillar of strength during my pregnancy. From critical concerns to seemingly trivial questions, she addressed everything with remarkable calmness. Dr. Daksha was my trusted companion from conception to delivery, providing the best possible treatment and support.

I feel truly blessed to have had Dr. Daksha as my doctor throughout this journey. Thankful for her unwavering care and expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Thyroid,
review:
My wonderful journey with Daksha ma'm started in 2020 December when me and my husband thought of having a baby.. 
First I met Daksha ma'm for my irregular periods, then she diagnosed me with PCOS and thyroid issues but she did not jump into any medications straight away instead she explained all the science behind irregular periods and it's association with PCOS and thyroid. Then she suggested only life style changes like exercise and diet control.
After few months my periods became regular and thyroid was under control, then I conceived naturally twice but miscarriage happened both the times. 
Then my real struggle started with healthy conception and in this phase Daksha ma'm really helped me a lot to overcome all the emotional stress and she helped me to understand the reasons for miscarriage and then she started with very basic fertility treatments like ovulation induction, IUI, follicular growth study. After 4 months of basic fertility treatment I was able to conceive naturally and was able to deliver a healthy baby via natural vaginal delivery.. :)
I wrote this much lengthy review just to make anyone understand why they should consult and trust Daksha ma'm. My 3 years journey with Daksha ma'm was really amazing and I thank her for everything. Today I am holding my angel in my arms means, it's all because of Daksha ma'm help and effort.
I recommend anyone who is trying to find trustworthy gynecologist can reach out to Daksha ma'm without any doubts..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Words won't suffice to say how much Dr.Daksha(@C9) has been supportive throughout my pregnancy journey.  But for her, I'm sure I won't have enjoyed my pregnancy as much as I did. She's very patient and extremely positive. Someone who always radiated positivity. She was  extremely keen to have my baby delivered vaginally and kept reassuring me during my visits about  it. I would recommend her for any of the gynaecology related issues. Doctors are God sent they say, she is indeed one !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It‚Äôs been a little late for the review and ratings but I'd like to take a moment to share our experience with Daksha Ma‚Äôam 

Recently blessed with Baby Boy
I sincerely appreciate your help and concern even after delivery.
Dr.Daksha has always been really nice, humble, polite, and kind, and we have been consulting with her since day one. Every time we need it,l the doctor responds to our questions and concerns. We adhered to the doctor's recommendations, and everything went off without a hitch. üôèüôèüôè.
Even for delivery with Ma‚Äôam we are quite fortunate.

I highly recommend Daksha ma‚Äôam 

Regards, Madhusmita & Mithun

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had an unfortunate experience with doctor Daksha. ***** ******** *** *** * ***** *** ******** *** ** ****** ************* ** ********* *** ***** ****** ** *** ** *** the scan report by cloudnine hospital was incorrect despite calling them multiple times to correct it. Instead of taking responsibility for it and proceeding with the treatment, the doctor started yelling at us for not coming earlier. We were being courteous *** *** ****** **** ** ** ****** **** ************* and eventually we decided to leave mid consultation.

*** ** *** **** ******** ****** * **** **** ******** I was diagnosed with ovarian cyst in my left ovary, initially she explained the different types of cysts and the cons related to it. *** *** *********** *** *** ***** She focused only on the negative points but not on the positive plausible solutions. ******* **** ********** ********* ********** she directly suggested a laparoscopic surgery without even seeing the CA125 reports and torsions values. She wrote innumerable tests **** ** **** ***** **** * ******* ********

tags: Wait time,
review: Didn‚Äôt even see the doctor, bad experience at the counter they wanted me to again download their own app and register as their member on the app and only then they would have confirmed my appointment let me meet the doctor, their help desk is worse than than a mall billing counter where you don‚Äôt even have a choice whether you want to download a app or not, they are least bothered that you might have taken few hours off from office for this appointment, your time has least amount of value for these people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Daksha is the most wonderful doctor I have come across. I visited her for vaginismus treatment. I was suffering from it for last 4 years and it affected my mental health and my relationship drastically, to the point of no return. I visited multiple doctors and searched so much about the issue, there is not much awareness about this. I went through complete mental ordeal, lot of gynacs suggested that I need to consult therapist , sexologist etc, i tried doing everything but with no success. Then I came across Dr Daksha post reading reviews on Practo, calling her an angel is like an understatement. What she did was nothing less than a miracle. She gave me complete time and focus and taught me how to do dilator training, she helped me with the whole insertion process. I was in her clinic for about an hour, she patiently taught me and made me practice there itself. Within a week, I was able to insert the largest dilator. I just can't thank her enough for saving me. Dr Daksha please let me know if I can be of any help to you, would be willing to do whatever I can. I don't think I can express the impact of what you did, thank you so much for helping me!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr.Daksha during our pregnancy and she was very friendly and always guided us in every visit. The best part was she used to appreciate us what we were doing right and if any issue arose, she would provide us solution by suggesting dietary changes and exercise. I would highly recommend this doctor if you are pregnant for the first time, she always patiently listens to all questions and clarifies them one by one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a wonderful experience with Dr. Daksha Bakre at Cloudnine hospital. She has incredible experience and is very helpful and friendly. We especially loved how Dr. Daksha really took her time to explain everything in a clear manner. Her advice and suggestions put us at ease and we felt confident in receiving expert medical care. Following all her advice ensured us a smooth pregnancy and delivery. We are so glad to choose her and would highly recommend Dr. Daksha to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her throughout my pregnancy..she is very friendly *** *************..i had very good experience with her she never made me make unnecessary hospital visits in my pregnancy..i would really recommend her to others.. thankyou Daksha mam for making my pregnancy journey healthy and beautiful!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
First visit : Good
Second visit : Good
Don't know what happened to the doc during our 3rd visit. She was extremely rude (without any reason.)
She pretends to be friendly but is actually not.
She herself shared her WhatsApp number for doubts and issues but then started blabbering random stuff like "If I think your question doesn't make sense then I won't answer it. I'm not here for chit-chats."
****** *** ********* ***** **** ***** * *** **** Yes, patients do not have medical expertise *** ****** *** ****** *** **** **** * ******* Even if their questions are naive, it's your duty to address them. 
My advise - Avoid this doctor. ***** *** **** ***** ************** *** *** *** **** *********** **** *** *** ** *** **** * ************* *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I I first visited Dr. Daksha for PCOD treatment. I had been to few doctors previously but no change. I a simply  gaining weight without knowing the exact reason. But she analyzed properly and found the root problem and she predicted that after 6 months you will come back with a positive pregnancy test and here i am pregnant after 6 months. I am really lucky to have found her. Her positivity is amazing, she always gives good hopes and she explains everything so that u understand it completely. * ***** ****** ******* ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ** *** ***** ******** my mother was facing problems due to some problem in uterus and irregular periods. Before meeting Dr.Daksha I consulted with many gynecologist but was not satisfied with the treatment, my mother was supposed to get biopsy done as prescribed by other doctors, without doing proper scans. After meeting Dr.daksha, she treated so well. my mother has to go under two scans before biopsy after that only we can treat further, after checking the report, Dr. informed we don't require any biopsy or further treatment. This news was very relaxing. my mother is good now without any biopsy done which she told is unnecessary and doesn't need any medicines or extra treatment, and gave few suggestions which she has to follow. very much happy with her treatment. I highly recommend Dr.Daksha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * ********* ** **** She made my complete pregnancy journey very smooth with her expert advice and proper guidance. I‚Äôm really thankful to her.
Great doctor. She understands and listens you carefully. Take time to explain the issue. Also she is very friendly and humble.

review: she was very much friendly...very mch clear in her words of explanation.... I got the satisfaction that I am in safe hands

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have consulted Dr Daksha for our pregnancy.*** ** **** *************friendly and gives us time to explain all our doubts. She aims to do normal delivery and suggests exercises for the same. 
Even in the labor room,she consoled me and gave me courage. 
She also manages to pick up calls whenever we have queries.
We are so glad we found her for our pregnancy care and would recommend her everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very open in communicating, clearly listens to our problems and suggest opinion. Consulted her for Dyspareunia and poly cystic ovaries, she physically examined, suggested further medications, have to see how it goes. But the  charge is high in cloud nine. In practo, they're saying 700‚Çπ, but in cloudnine they said Practo is no longer followed and charged 850‚Çπ as consultation and 150‚Çπ for registration.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Daksha, is the name that comes to my mind whenever someone asks me for gynecologist reference. Very clear and crisp consults. Amazing explanations to questions asked. During this stressful covid times, she made my pregnancy experience smooth and full of trust. Thanks a ton mam.. I will always be grateful to you and your advice.Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very very friendly doctor... listen all your issue and give proper solution.. met with many doctors *** *** ** *** **** ** * ******** she handled my wife pregnancy very well.. what she was suggested we followed and happy with the results.. once again.. highly recommended doctor..

tags: Value for money,
review: The whole checkup was hardly for 5 mins. The doctor asked me to buy an Ph indicator included glove to check for any infections. Apart from the 600 consultation fees, that was an additional 155 rupees. **** ***** **** **** **** ** ****** ***** ***** ** * ****** ****** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Daksha is very friendly. I did not feel like meeting a doctor she is more like a friend. She explained me and my husband about the problem and solution. She did not prescribed any medication straight away instead she suggested natural remedies to my problem, she has given me 3 months time to get recover naturally if that doesn't work then she will start medication.. I recommend doctor Daksha for all your gynec problems..

The doctor was very friendly. 
I visited her for my mother. She gone through all her previous appointments prescription and was very humble explaining the issue and it's procedures.
I would totally recommend this doctor.
I recommend  Dr daksha. She is very friendly and have lot of patience to listen our problems and clarify the doubts.
All good with the doctor. Very friendly, understood the issues a d addressed them. We will be revisiting once the checkups are done.
